info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:57PM CDT until April 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Southeastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Western Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Stratford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Stratford, Griggs, Conlen and Texhoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
